title: {{w|CAVES OF }}{{rainbow|QUOLOR}} {{r|+}} {{prismatic|QUONTAINERS}}
description: Adds more liquid containers, and new tiles (full/empty) for aforementioned and all other containers in game.  Colors are set for many things which did not have color.  New unique tiles that match description of item/character instead of using over reused tiles, as vanilla does.
author: helado, Plutovi, cantorsdust, alividlife
